news.author: Shannon Carroll
news.title: Microsoft stock just hit a record high as it cashes in on the AI boom
news.description: Microsoft (MSFT) stock just clocked an intraday record on Thursday ($468.49), a milestone that caps off the company’s aggressive AI moves — and even more aggressive expectations. Wall Street isn’t just rewarding Microsoft for showing up to the AI race, it’s p…
